Name: Maximiliano
Ingredients: 37.5 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
22.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice.
Review: The subtly smoky notes of mezcal combine brilliantly with the aromatic bittersweetness of gentian liqueur in this fabulously complex White Negroni -like aperitivo. (If using  dry vermouth in place of bianco vermouth, you'll need to add 2.5ml of rich sugar syrup.)
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Julio Xoxocotla at Ward III in New York City.
Nutrition: One serving of Maximiliano contains 151 calories
